MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock, affecting properties in Don Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault on Tweed Street caused by third party damage. Due to the extensive damage on the cables, we now expect your supply to be restored by 7pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.20pm on Friday 16th October 2020.
